title: The Season 1 Finale - Game Showdown
description:
Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code KF20 for $20 off polarized sunglasses.

Go to http://factormeals.com/kindafunny50 and use code kindafunny50 to get 50% off.

Can Team Tim finish the story or do Team Greg or Team Andy have something up their sleeve to win the season?

Season 1 Ep .10

00:02:38 - First Question & Housekeeping
00:07:10 - Mad Categoriez

00:30:42 - Final Feudy
